name: Slime Jump (Team_Bean)
description:
Move with the arrow keys and press the down key to slam down, if you manage to slam on some enemies consecutively it'll give you a score multiplier.

Stay over the grey dotted line or you'll fall down, if you are in a tricky situation you can use the boosts (the blue arrows) to launch you upwards.

See if you can manage to beat a high score.
